QuestData.Title: Where's The Chief?
QuestData.Description:
This is the only part of the fortress we haven't yet searched, $n. If Commander Eranog is anywhere, it has to be here.
<Velomir glances towards the nearby doorway.>
Let us see what we can find out.
QuestData.LogDescription: Accompany Guardian Velomir and inspect the Lookout Tower within South Hold Gate.
QuestData.RewardText: Damn it all! The commander was behind this? I cannot believe he would betray us like this.
